nodes.text: Desert razorbacks were large, porcine creatures living in the deserts of Tatooine. They were related to the zucca boar.
Despite their wild appearance, desert razorbacks were herbivores.

Desert razorbacks appeared in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. They are almost identical to zucca boars. The game designers obivously used the same base model with slightly different textures.
